scripts.jekyll: npm run browserify && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build: npm run clean:prebuild && npm run jekyll && npm run copy && gulp get-hash && npm run minify && gulp inject && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.browserify: browserify -t [ browserify-css --stripComments=true src/vendors/vendors.css --output src/jekyll/vendors.bundle.css] src/vendors/vendors.js -o src/jekyll/vendors.bundle.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:images && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.copy: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:root-files && gulp copy:admin
